title: Please give Taliyah vector casting...
body:
The new paradigm makes her needlessly clunky and it just takes too much active input from the player (while also locking you out of other abilities). Vector casting just feels much more natural. 

This is a humble petition to get Taliyah to have vector casing on her W.

replies.body: The developer on the champion has weighed in on this issue, and specifically stated that they did not want her w to be vector cast. I don't think any amount of support will get that changed.

Oh, hey again!

The reason he stated was the two champs with vector casting (Viktor, Rumble) see people stop playing with time... or something like that. Yet my argument is... Taliyah feels like she was literally made for vector cast. Viktor and Rumble may simply not feel rewarding enough to see the impact.

Taliyah...
... YOU WILL NOTICE THE CAST'S IMPACT. She will be fun with the vector cast and people will stick with her because of it.

Trouble is, we probably won't see changes to the cast until the designer is no longer sitting on Taliyah and puts her in the hands of the rest of Riot.


The only real reason they wouldn't want vector cast is that it gates super-quick players from W+E, maybe, to keep her from being too oppressive?

I'll be honest, the self-silence on her w feels pretty shitty and a vector cast would probably solve that issue. No one uses the neutral knock up anyways, so you could get rid of it. I just don't think it's going to happen any time soon because it's a more "feel" mechanic than a balance one.
I fucking hate every single one of you for this thread. Vector casting ruined the character and people like you lead to this asinine change. Thanks for ruining the champ.

Yeah, riot's defense for not giving her vector casting is basically that they want it to be difficult to pull off her combo... except that making a champion feel clunky by forcibly changing the players APM never feels good.
